title: OAuth Authentication with Google - Successful Login
description: Verify that users can successfully log in using Google OAuth authentication and obtain a valid session.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Select the Google OAuth sign-in option.
Complete Google sign-in with valid credentials.
Verify user is redirected to the dashboard.
Verify a valid authenticated session is established.

title: OAuth Authentication with GitHub - Successful Login
description: Validate that users can log in using GitHub OAuth and establish a secure session.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Select the GitHub OAuth sign-in option.
Complete GitHub sign-in with valid credentials.
Verify user is redirected to the dashboard.
Verify a valid authenticated session is established.

title: OAuth Authentication - Invalid Credentials
description: Ensure authentication fails gracefully when invalid credentials are provided to OAuth providers.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Select Google or GitHub OAuth login.
Enter invalid credentials and attempt to login.
Verify login fails and an appropriate error message is displayed.
Verify no session is created.

title: Audio File Upload via Drag-and-Drop - Valid File
description: Check that audio files can be uploaded correctly using the drag-and-drop interface with real-time waveform visualization.

steps.description: Authenticate and navigate to the upload page.
Drag and drop a valid supported audio file into the upload area.
Verify that the waveform visualization of the audio file is displayed in real-time.
Verify that the file upload process completes successfully.

title: Audio File Upload via Drag-and-Drop - Unsupported File Type
description: Verify that uploading unsupported or invalid file types is handled properly with user feedback.

steps.description: Authenticate and navigate to the upload page.
Attempt to drag-and-drop a non-audio file (e.g., .txt or .exe) into the upload area.
Verify that the upload is rejected with a clear error message.
Verify no upload or transcription process is initiated.

title: Audio Recording via Browser - Successful Recording and Upload
description: Verify that users can record audio directly in the browser with real-time waveform and submit the recording for transcription.

steps.description: Authenticate and navigate to the recording interface.
Start audio recording.
Verify real-time waveform is displayed during recording.
Stop recording.
Submit the recorded audio for transcription.
Verify the recording is uploaded successfully.

title: AI Transcription Accuracy with Speaker Diarization
description: Validate that the transcription returned by AssemblyAI includes accurate speech-to-text conversion and speaker diarization.

steps.description: Upload or record an audio file containing multiple speakers.
Send the audio to the transcription service.
Verify that the transcription text matches the spoken content accurately.
Verify that the transcription output correctly identifies and separates different speakers.

title: Storage and Retrieval of Audio Files
description: Ensure audio files are correctly stored in Supabase Storage and can be retrieved securely by their owners.

steps.description: Upload an audio file.
Verify that the file is stored in Supabase Storage.
Attempt to retrieve the file as the authenticated owner.
Verify that the file is successfully retrieved.
Attempt to retrieve the same file as a different user.
Verify access is denied due to row-level security.

title: Row-Level Security Enforcement in Supabase PostgreSQL
description: Verify that database row-level security policies prevent unauthorized data access.

steps.description: Login as User A and create or upload transcriptions.
Login as User B and attempt to access User A's transcription records via API or UI.
Verify that access to User A's data is denied for User B.

title: Dashboard Overview Display
description: Check that the dashboard correctly displays user statistics, recent transcriptions, and provides quick action capabilities.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to the dashboard.
Verify the dashboard shows correct user transcription statistics.
Verify recent transcriptions are listed with correct metadata.
Verify quick action buttons function as expected (e.g., upload, record).

title: Transcriptions Management - Search, Filter and Bulk Operations
description: Validate that users can efficiently search, filter, and perform bulk operations on their transcriptions without errors.

steps.description: Navigate to transcriptions management page.
Enter a search query matching existing transcriptions.
Verify relevant transcriptions are displayed matching the search.
Apply various filter criteria (date range, speaker, project).
Verify only transcriptions matching filters are shown.
Select multiple transcriptions and perform bulk actions (e.g. delete, move to project).
Verify bulk actions are executed successfully without errors.

title: Project Organization - Grouping and Access of Transcriptions
description: Verify users can create projects, group transcriptions within projects, and access them correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to projects page.
Create a new project.
Assign existing transcriptions to the new project.
Verify transcriptions appear under the assigned project.
Attempt to access project transcriptions from the dashboard.
Verify correct transcriptions loaded for the project.

title: User Settings Persistence and Update
description: Check that changes made in the user settings panel persist correctly and update the user profile without errors.

steps.description: Navigate to the settings panel.
Update various user preferences and profile details.
Save the settings.
Verify that changes are saved and reflected in the profile data.
Reload the settings page.
Verify that saved settings are persistently loaded.

title: Responsive Landing Page Rendering Across Devices
description: Validate that the landing page renders correctly and maintains responsiveness and smooth animated interactions using Framer Motion and Tailwind CSS on various device sizes and browsers.

steps.description: Open the landing page on desktop browsers Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge.
Verify page layout, images, animations, and interactive voice demo function correctly and smoothly.
Resize browser window to mobile dimensions and reload.
Verify responsive layout is correct, all elements remain accessible and animations perform smoothly.
Open landing page on real mobile devices (iOS and Android).
Confirm layout, animations, and interactive demos function without issues.

title: Error Handling During Transcription Service Failure
description: Test that the system properly handles errors returned by the AssemblyAI transcription API and provides appropriate user feedback.

steps.description: Upload or record an audio file and simulate AssemblyAI API failure (e.g., network error, invalid request).
Verify that the app displays a clear error message to the user indicating transcription failure.
Verify no incomplete or corrupted transcription record is saved in the database.

title: Session Management and Secure Logout
description: Ensure authenticated sessions are maintained securely and users can log out successfully clearing sessions.

steps.description: Log in via OAuth.
Verify that the user session persists across page reloads.
Click logout button.
Verify that the user session is terminated and redirected to the login or landing page.
Attempt to access a protected page post-logout.
Verify access is denied and user is redirected to login.

title: Access Control Validation on Protected Routes
description: Validate that all authenticated user-only routes properly restrict unauthenticated access.

steps.description: Attempt to navigate directly to dashboard, upload, transcription, projects, and settings pages without login.
Verify redirection to login page or landing page.
Login and verify access to protected pages.
Verify authorized access is granted.

title: Real-time Waveform Visualization Performance on Mobile Devices
description: Ensure the waveform visualization during audio recording and playback is smooth and performant on popular mobile devices.

steps.description: Open the recording interface on Android and iOS mobile devices.
Record audio and observe waveform visualization.
Verify that the waveform updates in real time without lag or rendering glitches.
Play back recorded audio and observe waveform.
Verify smooth waveform visualization during playback.
